participant_1.background:
I'm focused on my health and fitness.
I enjoy my work as a translator and have a quiet lifestyle in my free time.
i love trips to the beach.
i get distracted easily.
I live in a house where I'm not allowed to bring my bladed weapons into the kitchen.

participant_2.background:
I want to show off my new earrings to my friends.
I'm proud of who I am, and I'm not going to let my vision impairment stop me from living my life to the fullest.
my ultimate dream , however , is to be a writer.
i drive a ford taurus.
i like to sing broadway show tunes.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Hey! My day is going well, thanks. Just got some new earrings and I'm excited to show them off to my friends.
Oh, that sounds fun! What kind of earrings are they?
They're gold hoops with a little diamond in the middle.
Oh, those sound really pretty! I love gold jewelry.
Me too! It's so classic and elegant.
Do you have any other hobbies besides jewelry?
I love to sing! I used to be in a choir, but I don't get to sing much anymore.
Oh, that's too bad! I love to sing too. I used to be in a choir too.
Really? What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like to sing all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably Broadway show tunes.
Oh, that's awesome! I love Broadway show tunes too!
Maybe we should start a singing group!
That would be so much fun! We could be the best of friends.
I think we just might be!
